Headline: #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Sacramento
ShortDescription: 112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Western, 103rd, Kedzie and 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Western, 103rd, Kedzie and 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Sacramento.

Allow extra travel time.
